title: "ADC going 0/3 due to stupid gameplay"
body:
"GG" the self-centered asshole whines.

Meanwhile, mid, jungle and top are doing well, enough to potentially carry the game is the ADC would buckle down and stop fighting the 5-0 Corki.

But noooo, the now 0-5 ADC just says "fuck this" and leaves.

"Outplayed" exclaimed the enemy team.

I totally deserved to lose a promo match because the game is now a 4v5, BUT AT LEAST I WON'T BE CALLED A NOOB becuase that would be upsetting.

Thanks Riot, four years and counting
